name: picfan
description: Central manager for admin, backend, and website project

scripts.allnpmi: cd website && npm i -f && cd ../admin && npm i -f && cd ../backend && npm i -f
scripts.allnpmdev: cd website && npm run dev & cd ../admin && npm run dev & cd ../backend && npm run dev
scripts.allnpmbuild: cd website && npm run build && cd ../admin && npm run build && cd ..

author: Single Solution
